title: The Pig's wedding
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Kratky Film and Gene Deitch
brief_description: Smoke signals herald the impending marriage of pigs Porker and Curly Tail. The guests are busy cleaning, preening and painting on the perfect outfits, then it’s time for some serious eating, drinking and dancing, until rain threatens the celebrations.
creator_credit_for_label: Weston Woods Studios, Kratky Film and Gene Deitch
